A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's not a one star film but it's certainly not a very good film.
Firstly I do like Star Wars\, quite a lot. Enjoyed Rogue One and Force Awakens\, despite FA borrowing way too much from A New Hope.

SPOILERS
The dialogue is terrible in most places. It explains everything in every scene to make sure even the youngest of viewers know what's going on.
The story isn't great\, the characters make terrible decisions and our protagonist have the most amazing dumb luck at every corner. Don't close the big steal doors until that one ship comes into the base.. Oh lucky it was just Finn. Oh Finn's going to get killed by Phasma\, nope. Luckily BB8 can do everything.
Things just don't make sense\, Luke left a map (Remember that was the majority of the FA story) so that he could be found should he be needed. Nah\, turns out he went to the island to die. Luke throwing away\, in a comical manner\, a light saber that means so much to him and his family. So funny\, classic Luke!

It's beautifully shot\, the final battle is awesome to look at\, even though I was bored to tears at this point. It's such a shame\, I wanted to love this but its just not very good.
